title: PyTorch does not work with CUDA 9.1 if built from source using Docker
body_html: I am compiling PyTorch from source using Docker. I replaced nvidia/cuda:9.0-cudnn7-devel-ubuntu16.04 with nvidia/cuda:9.1-cudnn7-devel-ubuntu16.04 but after compilation torch.version.cuda and torch.cuda.get_device_name(0) give me error. If I build with CUDA 9 things are fine.
